excerpt: "The global artificial intelligence market size is expected to reach $169,411.8 million in 2025, from $4,065.0 million in 2016 growing at a CAGR of 55.6% from 2018 to 2025. Artificial Intelligence (AI) has been one of the most progressive technologies in computer science since its introduction in the 1950s."
